UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: A comparative study on the structure and function of a cytolytic alpha-helical peptide and its antimicrobial beta-sheet diastereomer.
Literature.Author: Oren Z, Hong J, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter calcoaceticus Ac11(MIC=2.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=1.2µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=0.8µM)
